Hello Everyone,

It is Rev Gabrielle here, I want to invite you to this great event that is happening in Summerville. I thought it appropriate because Ghandi is an example of a person so focused on his mission that he had a huge effect on the world. (Catered Indian food too!)

Here are the details....

See you there,
Rev Gabrielle

TITLE: 100th Anniversary of Gandhi's Mission for Peace

On September 11th, 1906, Mohandas K. Gandhi launched the modern non-violence movement in his quest for justice.

On September 11th, 2001, that quest was challenged with the World Trade Center attacks.

On this 100th anniversary of Ghandi?s revolutionary cause, we have a choice to linger in the loss or resurrect the momentum of his radical mission.

This September 11th, join THE CENTER OF LIGHT~ BOSTON at Jimmy Tingle?s Off Broadway Theater at 255 Elm Street, Davis Square, Somerville for a dinner reception and fund-raiser in support of the modern-day peace movement. Proceeds to benefit The Peace Alliance &
The Peace Temple Initiative. Catering generously donated by Diva Indian Bistro, Davis Square, Somerville.

6pm: Dinner and short film by The Gandhi Institute
7:30pm: viewing of the Academy Award winning movie, Gandhi, starring Ben Kingsley (3 hrs 10mins).


Tickets are $25, available at www.jimmytingle.com or by calling 617.441.0522

The tickets are $20 if you pick them up @ THE CENTER OF LIGHT Boston, call 617.852.2822 or CenterOfLightBoston@gmail.com
